languages.text: Each attack made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all subsequent attacks they make this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +5%. This effect stacks up to 3 times. Area attacks, burst attacks (including the {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}), and any other attacks that deal multiple hits are considered single attacks.

traits.locale_text: Each attack made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all subsequent attacks they make this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +5%. This effect stacks up to 3 times. Blade Dance, area of effect attacks, burst fire attacks and other attacks that inflict multiple hits still count as one attack.
Each attack made by the Bladedancer increases the damage of all the following attacks the Bladedancer makes this turn by +5%.
Each attack made by the Bladedancer increases the damage of all the following attacks the Bladedancer makes this turn by +5%.

Each attack made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all subsequent attacks they make this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +5%. This effect stacks up to 3 times. Area attacks, burst attacks (including the {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}), and any other attacks that deal multiple hits are considered single attacks.

Each attack made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all subsequent attacks they make this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +5%. This effect stacks up to 3 times. Area attacks, burst attacks (including the {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}), and any other attacks that deal multiple hits are considered single attacks.

languages.text: Cada ataque que realiza el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} aumenta el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de los siguientes ataques que realice este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} un +5 %. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 3 veces. Los ataques de área, en ráfaga (incluyendo {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Danza de espada{/g}), y cualquier otro ataque que infliga múltiples impactos solo cuentan como un ataque.
languages.original_text: Each attack made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all subsequent attacks they make this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +5%. This effect stacks up to 3 times. Area attacks, burst attacks (including the {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}), and any other attacks that deal multiple hits are considered single attacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada ataque que realiza el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} aumenta el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de los siguientes ataques que realice este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} un +5 %. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 3 veces. Los ataques de área, en ráfaga (incluyendo {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Danza de espada{/g}), y cualquier otro ataque que infliga múltiples impactos solo cuentan como un ataque.

Cada ataque que realiza el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} aumenta el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de los siguientes ataques que realice este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} un +5 %.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が行う攻撃は、それぞれ、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}でそのあとに続くすべての攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を+5%増加させる。この効果は最大3回まで累積する。範囲攻撃、バースト攻撃（{g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}ブレード・ダンス{/g}を含む）、その他複数のヒットを与える攻撃は単発攻撃とみなされる。
languages.original_text: Each attack made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all subsequent attacks they make this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +5%. This effect stacks up to 3 times. Area attacks, burst attacks (including the {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}), and any other attacks that deal multiple hits are considered single attacks.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が行う攻撃は、それぞれ、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}でそのあとに続くすべての攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を+5%増加させる。この効果は最大3回まで累積する。範囲攻撃、バースト攻撃（{g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}ブレード・ダンス{/g}を含む）、その他複数のヒットを与える攻撃は単発攻撃とみなされる。
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が行う攻撃は、それぞれ、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}でそのあとに続くすべての攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を+5%増加させる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}的每次攻击，都会使本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内所有后续攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高5%，此效果最多叠加3次。范围攻击、连发攻击（包括{g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}利刃之舞{/g}），以及其他可造成多段伤害的攻击，都视为单次攻击。
languages.original_text: Each attack made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all subsequent attacks they make this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +5%. This effect stacks up to 3 times. Area attacks, burst attacks (including the {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}), and any other attacks that deal multiple hits are considered single attacks.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}的每次攻击，都会使本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内所有后续攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高5%，此效果最多叠加3次。范围攻击、连发攻击（包括{g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}利刃之舞{/g}），以及其他可造成多段伤害的攻击，都视为单次攻击。
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}的每次攻击，都会使本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内所有后续攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高5%。

languages.text: Chaque attaque exécutée par le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} augmente de +5 % les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des attaques suivantes réalisées au cours de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cet effet est cumulable jusqu'à 3 fois. Les attaques de zone, attaques en rafale (y compris {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Danse des lames{/g}) et autres attaques à plusieurs coups sont considérées comme des attaques ponctuelles.
languages.original_text: Each attack made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all subsequent attacks they make this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +5%. This effect stacks up to 3 times. Area attacks, burst attacks (including the {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}), and any other attacks that deal multiple hits are considered single attacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque attaque effectuée par le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} augmente de +5 % les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des attaques suivantes réalisées au cours de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cet effet est cumulable jusqu'à 3 fois. Les attaques de zone, attaques en rafale (y compris {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Danse des Lames{/g}) et autres attaques à plusieurs coups sont considérées comme des attaques ponctuelles.

Chaque attaque effectuée par le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} augmente de +5 % les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des attaques suivantes réalisées au cours de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cet effet est cumulable jusqu'à 3 fois. Les attaques de zone, attaques en rafale (y compris {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Danse des Lames{/g}) et autres attaques à plusieurs coups sont considérées comme des attaques ponctuelles.

languages.text: Jeder Angriff des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzers{/g} erhöht den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aller seiner Folgeangriffe mit diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} um +5 %. Dieser Effekt ist bis zu 3-mal stapelbar. Bereichs- und Salvenangriffe (einschließlich {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Klingentanz{/g}) und alle anderen Angriffe, die mehrere Treffer verursachen, werden als Einzelangriffe gewertet.
languages.original_text: Each attack made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all subsequent attacks they make this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +5%. This effect stacks up to 3 times. Area attacks, burst attacks (including the {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}), and any other attacks that deal multiple hits are considered single attacks.

traits.locale_text: Jeder Angriff des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzers{/g} erhöht den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aller seiner Folgeangriffe mit diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} um +5 %. Dieser Effekt ist bis zu 3-mal stapelbar. Bereichs- und Salvenangriffe (einschließlich {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Klingentanz{/g}) und alle anderen Angriffe, die mehrere Treffer verursachen, werden als Einzelangriffe gewertet.

languages.text: Каждая атака, совершаемая {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцором смерти{/g}, увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} его последующих атак в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} на 5%. Эффект суммируется до 3 раз. Атака по области, атака очередью (в том числе {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Танец клинков{/g}) и любая другая атака, наносящая несколько ударов, считается одной атакой.
languages.original_text: Each attack made by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all subsequent attacks they make this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} by +5%.

traits.locale_text: Каждая атака {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцора смерти{/g} увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} всех его последующих атак в том же {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} на 5%.
Каждая атака {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцора смерти{/g} увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} всех его последующих атак в том же {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} на 5%.
